p: The fixed babassu almond oil is usually artisanally extracted, and the generated residues are a source of organic matter that serve as a source of proteins, fibers, minerals, and vitamins [ 6, 7]. However, the mechanical oil extraction through almond pressing is the main method used by industries and corporations, this being less aggressive than the artisanal process, which minimizes oil oxidation providing a longer shelf life and conservation [ 8].
